  2
  3/** @file    vsip/core/working-view.hpp
  4    @author  Jules Bergmann
  5    @date    2005-12-27
  6    @brief   VSIPL++ Library: Utilities for local working views.
  7
  8    Used for working with distributed data by replicating a copy locally
  9    to each processor.
 10     - Assign_local() transfers data between local and distributed views.
 11     - Working_view_holder creates a local working view of an argument,
 12       either replicating a distributed view to a local copy, or aliasing
 13       a local view.
 14*/
 15
 16#ifndef VSIP_CORE_WORKING_VIEW_HPP
 17#define VSIP_CORE_WORKING_VIEW_HPP
 18

 20  Included Files
 21***********************************************************************/

 24#include <vsip/vector.hpp>
 25#include <vsip/matrix.hpp>
 26#include <vsip/core/parallel/services.hpp>
 27#include <vsip/core/static_assert.hpp>
 28#include <vsip/core/metaprogramming.hpp>

 36namespace vsip

 39namespace impl

 41
 42// Create a new view of type 'ViewT' that has the same dimensions as the
 43// existing view.
 44
 45template <typename ViewT,
 46	  typename T,
 47	  typename Block>
 48ViewT
 49clone_view(const_Vector<T, Block> view)
 50{
 51  ViewT ret(view.size(0));
 52  return ret;
 53}
 54
 55template <typename ViewT,
 56	  typename T,
 57	  typename Block>
 58ViewT
 59clone_view(const_Matrix<T, Block> view)
 60{
 61  ViewT ret(view.size(0), view.size(1));
 62  return ret;
 63}
 64
 65template <typename ViewT,
 66	  typename T,
 67	  typename Block>
 68ViewT
 69clone_view(const_Tensor<T, Block> view)
 70{
 71  ViewT ret(view.size(0), view.size(1), view.size(2));
 72  return ret;
 73}
 74
 75
 76
 77template <typename ViewT,
 78	  typename T,
 79	  typename BlockT,
 80	  typename MapT>
 81ViewT
 82clone_view(const_Vector<T, BlockT> view, MapT const& map)
 83{
 84  ViewT ret(view.size(0), map);
 85  return ret;
 86}
 87
 88template <typename ViewT,
 89	  typename T,
 90	  typename BlockT,
 91	  typename MapT>
 92ViewT
 93clone_view(const_Matrix<T, BlockT> view, MapT const& map)
 94{
 95  ViewT ret(view.size(0), view.size(1), map);
 96  return ret;
 97}
 98
 99template <typename ViewT,
100	  typename T,
101	  typename BlockT,
102	  typename MapT>
103ViewT
104clone_view(const_Tensor<T, BlockT> view, MapT const& map)
105{
106  ViewT ret(view.size(0), view.size(1), view.size(2), map);
107  return ret;
108}
109
110
111
112// Helper class for assigning between local and distributed views.
113
114template <typename View1,
115	  typename View2,
116	  bool     IsLocal1
117	           = Is_local_map<typename View1::block_type::map_type>::value,
118	  bool     IsLocal2
119	           = Is_local_map<typename View2::block_type::map_type>::value>
120struct Assign_local {};
121
122// Local to local case.  Both views are local, just copy the data.
123
124template <typename View1,
125	  typename View2>
126struct Assign_local<View1, View2, true, true>
127{
128  static void exec(View1 dst, View2 src)
129  {
130    dst = src;
131  }
132};
133
134// Global to local case.  Destination is local, so copy source into
135// replicated view, then copy from local view.
136
137template <typename View1,
138	  typename View2>
139struct Assign_local<View1, View2, true, false>
140{
141  static void exec(View1 dst, View2 src)
142  {
143    dimension_type const dim = View1::dim;
144
145    typedef typename View1::value_type                     T;
146    typedef typename View1::block_type                     block1_type;
147    typedef Global_map<dim>                                map_type;
148    typedef typename Block_layout<block1_type>::order_type order_type;
149    typedef Dense<dim, T, order_type, map_type>            block_type;
150    typedef typename View_of_dim<dim, T, block_type>::type view_type;
151
152    view_type view(clone_view<view_type>(dst));
153
154    view = src;
155    dst  = view.local();
156  }
157};
158
159// Local to global case.  Source is local, so copy source into
160// replicated view, then copy to destination view.
161
162template <typename View1,
163	  typename View2>
164struct Assign_local<View1, View2, false, true>
165{
166  static void exec(View1 dst, View2 src)
167  {
168    dimension_type const dim = View1::dim;
169
170    typedef typename View1::value_type                     T;
171    typedef typename View1::block_type                     block2_type;
172    typedef Global_map<dim>                                map_type;
173    typedef typename Block_layout<block2_type>::order_type order_type;
174    typedef Dense<dim, T, order_type, map_type>            block_type;
175    typedef typename View_of_dim<dim, T, block_type>::type view_type;
176
177    view_type view(clone_view<view_type>(dst));
178
179    view.local() = src;
180    dst          = view;
181  }
182};
183
184
185
186/// Guarded Assign_local
187
188template <bool     PerformAssignment,
189	  typename ViewT1,
190	  typename ViewT2>
191struct Assign_local_if
192{
193  static void exec(ViewT1 dst, ViewT2 src)
194  {
195    Assign_local<ViewT1, ViewT2>::exec(dst, src);
196  }
197};
198
199
200
201template <typename ViewT1,
202	  typename ViewT2>
203struct Assign_local_if<false, ViewT1, ViewT2>
204{
205  static void exec(ViewT1, ViewT2)
206  { /* no assignment */ }
207};
208
209
210
211/// Assign between local and distributed views.
212
213template <typename ViewT1,
214	  typename ViewT2>
215void assign_local(
216  ViewT1 dst,
217  ViewT2 src)
218{
219  VSIP_IMPL_STATIC_ASSERT((Is_view_type<ViewT1>::value));
220  VSIP_IMPL_STATIC_ASSERT((Is_view_type<ViewT2>::value));
221  VSIP_IMPL_STATIC_ASSERT(ViewT1::dim == ViewT2::dim);
222
223  Assign_local<ViewT1, ViewT2>
224    ::exec(dst, src);
225}
226
227
228
229/// Guarded assign between local and distributed views.
230
231template <bool     PerformAssignment,
232	  typename ViewT1,
233	  typename ViewT2>
234void assign_local_if(
235  ViewT1 dst,
236  ViewT2 src)
237{
238  VSIP_IMPL_STATIC_ASSERT((Is_view_type<ViewT1>::value));
239  VSIP_IMPL_STATIC_ASSERT((Is_view_type<ViewT2>::value));
240  VSIP_IMPL_STATIC_ASSERT(ViewT1::dim == ViewT2::dim);
241
242  Assign_local_if<PerformAssignment, ViewT1, ViewT2>::exec(dst, src);
243}
244
245
246
247/***********************************************************************
248  Definitions
249***********************************************************************/
250
251template <typename ViewT,
252	  typename MapT = typename ViewT::block_type::map_type>
253struct As_local_view
254{
255  static bool const is_copy = true;
256  static dimension_type const dim = ViewT::dim;
257
258  typedef typename ViewT::value_type                    value_type;
259  typedef typename ViewT::block_type                    block_type;
260  typedef typename Block_layout<block_type>::order_type order_type;
261
262  typedef Dense<dim, value_type, order_type, Local_map> r_block_type;
263
264  typedef typename 
265    ITE_Type<Is_const_view_type<ViewT>::value,
266      As_type<typename View_of_dim<dim, value_type, r_block_type>::type>,
267      As_type<typename View_of_dim<dim, value_type, r_block_type>::const_type>
268      >::type type;
269
270  static type exec(ViewT view)
271  {
272    // The internal view needs to be non-const, even if the function
273    // return type is const.
274    typedef typename
275      View_of_dim<dim, value_type, r_block_type>::type view_type;
276
277    view_type ret(clone_view<view_type>(view));
278    assign_local(ret, view);
279    return ret;
280  }
281};
282
283template <typename ViewT>
284struct As_local_view<ViewT, Local_map>
285{
286  static bool const is_copy = false;
287  typedef ViewT type;
288
289  static type exec(ViewT view) { return view; }
290};
291
292
293
294template <typename       ViewT,
295	  dimension_type Dim>
296struct As_local_view<ViewT, Global_map<Dim> >
297{
298  static bool const is_copy = false;
299  typedef typename ViewT::local_type type;
300
301  static type exec(ViewT view) { return view.local(); }
302};
303
304
305
306template <template <typename, typename> class ViewT,
307	  typename                            T,
308	  typename                            Block>
309typename As_local_view<ViewT<T, Block> >::type
310convert_to_local(ViewT<T, Block> view)
311{
312  return As_local_view<ViewT<T, Block> >::exec(view);
313}
314
315
316template <typename ViewT,
317	  bool     is_const = Is_const_view_type<ViewT>::value>
318struct Working_view_holder
319{
320public:
321  typedef typename As_local_view<ViewT>::type type;
322
323public:
324  Working_view_holder(ViewT v)
325    : orig_view(v), view(convert_to_local(v))
326  {}
327
328  ~Working_view_holder()
329  {
330    if (As_local_view<ViewT>::is_copy)
331    {
332      assign_local(orig_view, view);
333    }
334  }
335
336  // Member data.  This is intentionally public.
337private:
338  ViewT orig_view;
339
340public:
341  type  view;
342};
343
344
345
346template <typename ViewT>
347struct Working_view_holder<ViewT, true>
348{
349public:
350  typedef typename As_local_view<ViewT>::type type;
351
352public:
353  Working_view_holder(ViewT v)
354    : view(convert_to_local(v))
355  {}
356
357  ~Working_view_holder() {}
358
359  // Member data.  This is intentionally public.
360public:
361  type  view;
362};
363
